branchCategory.name: NC(D)JP, Pin Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: <P>The compact design of series NCJP double acting pin cylinder minimizes mounting space. The NCJP is available in five mounting options to accommodate many design styles. Bore sizes include 6, 10 and 15mm with strokes ranging from 5 to 30mm. Other features include brass panel mounting nuts, stainless steel piston rod and brass bodies. The NCJP series is also available in an auto switch capable model. </P>
